item.description: Come out and have some fun on Saturday night at the Breakers Restaurant inside the Ashworth Hotel. If you like, come early and have something to eat or just sit and talk. The DJ that doesn't mind taking requests so bring your dancing shoes! We will be meeting for conversation and dinner at 7:30 on Saturday April 28th. Feel free to come for dinner or just for dancing. The DJ starts playing at 9:00 and runs until 1:00. There will be people from other groups joining us as well. We usually sit all the way to the back of the room to the left of the dance floor or as close to there as possible! We'll have signs on the table. Hope to see you there :)
item.name: Ashworth by the Sea - Dinner/Dancing
